Audio Description: This poster was created to help United States soldiers recognize soldiers from other Allied countries during World War II. It features a black and white photograph of a Chinese soldier with a big smile, facing the viewer.  He is wearing a brimmed cap with an insignia and two buttons. His uniform has a high collar. Above him a blue band with white letters proclaims, “This man is your friend”. To the right of the soldier is a box with a blue border containing the word “Chinese” in black letters. Below the soldier is another blue band with the words “He fights for freedom” in white letters. Centered underneath this are three small white stars.
Creator: United States. Office of Facts and Figures. Graphics Division
